Yes and No. Luciferianism is a philosophy that promote free thinking and the veneration of Lucifer, the Lightbringer. Satanism is way to complex to categorize as fixed ideology and religion. As it is, some Satanist movements are similar to the way Luciferians see the Lord. Satanists movement see each other as heretics and are heavily divided between circles, sects or groups. This divide can’t be found in the Luciferianism. Luciferians don’t really exist anymore. So between the XIX century and the XXI century, the two conception of the faith have been fused in some sort of ways.
